TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BatteryManager extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: The BatteryManager class contains strings and constants used for values in the android.content.Intent#ACTION_BATTERY_CHANGED Intent, and provides a method for querying battery and charging properties.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: A containing a Java Native Interface (JNI) object reference.

Docs.summary: Sent when the device's battery has started charging (or has reached full charge and the device is on power).

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Sent when the device's battery may be discharging, so apps should avoid doing extraneous work that would cause it to discharge faster.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int64 ComputeChargeTimeRemaining() cil managed

Docs.summary: Compute an approximation for how much time (in milliseconds) remains until the battery is fully charged.
Docs.returns: how much time is left, in milliseconds, until the battery is fully charged or -1 if the computation fails

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra for android.content.Intent#ACTION_BATTERY_CHANGED: Boolean field indicating whether the battery is currently considered to be low, that is whether a Intent#ACTION_BATTERY_LOW broadcast has been sent.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra for android.content.Intent#ACTION_BATTERY_CHANGED: integer containing the current health constant.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra for android.content.Intent#ACTION_BATTERY_CHANGED: integer containing the resource ID of a small status bar icon indicating the current battery state.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra for android.content.Intent#ACTION_BATTERY_CHANGED: integer field containing the current battery level, from 0 to #EXTRA_SCALE.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra for android.content.Intent#ACTION_BATTERY_CHANGED: integer indicating whether the device is plugged in to a power source; 0 means it is on battery, other constants are different types of power sources.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra for android.content.Intent#ACTION_BATTERY_CHANGED: boolean indicating whether a battery is present.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra for android.content.Intent#ACTION_BATTERY_CHANGED: integer containing the maximum battery level.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra for android.content.Intent#ACTION_BATTERY_CHANGED: integer containing the current status constant.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra for android.content.Intent#ACTION_BATTERY_CHANGED: String describing the technology of the current battery.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra for android.content.Intent#ACTION_BATTERY_CHANGED: integer containing the current battery temperature.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra for android.content.Intent#ACTION_BATTERY_CHANGED: integer containing the current battery voltage level.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: abstract member GetIntProperty : int -> int override this.GetIntProperty : int -> int
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetIntProperty(int32 id) cil managed

Docs.summary: Return the value of a battery property of integer type.
Docs.returns: the property value. If the property is not supported or there is any other error, return (a) 0 if targetSdkVersion < VERSION_CODES.P or (b) Integer.MIN_VALUE if targetSdkVersion >= VERSION_CODES.P.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: abstract member GetLongProperty : int -> int64 override this.GetLongProperty : int -> int64
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int64 GetLongProperty(int32 id) cil managed

Docs.summary: Return the value of a battery property of long type If the platform does not provide the property queried, this value will be Long.
Docs.returns: the property value, or Long.MIN_VALUE if not supported.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Return true if the battery is currently considered to be charging.
